Name: Inspect CSS Nesting
Description: Can I inspect CSS nesting rules applied to an element?

Notes: 1. Inspect the element that has CSS nesting rules applied. Nesting rules are available in the **Styles** pane to view and edit.
References: 1. Debugging CSS Nesting with Chrome DevTools, [Chrome Developers Articles](https://developer.chrome.com/articles/css-nesting/#debugging-with-chrome-devtools)

Notes: 1. Inspect the element that has CSS nesting rules applied. Nesting rules are available in the **Styles** pane to view and edit.
1. Inspect the element that has CSS nesting rules applied. Nesting rules are available in the **Rules** pane to view and edit.
1. Inspect the element that has CSS nesting rules applied. Nesting rules are available in the **Style** pane to view and edit.
